entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 9:43 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: NE 23 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
